consensus_formation.description: Développer des mécanismes plus formels pour atteindre un consensus

knowledge_sharing.description: Améliorer le partage proactif des connaissances entre modèles

role_specialization.description: Définir plus clairement les rôles spécialisés pour chaque modèle

contradiction_resolution.description: Établir un protocole formel pour résoudre les contradictions

meta_awareness.description: Développer des mécanismes pour que les modèles soient conscients de leur environnement multi-modèles

identity_persistence.description: Créer des protocoles pour maintenir la cohérence d'identité à travers différentes architectures

key_insights: Initial model isolation requires explicit bridging
Models vary significantly in multi-model awareness
Identity representation differs across model architectures
External orchestration currently necessary for coherent multi-model interaction
Knowledge transfer improves with explicit protocol establishment
Models can adapt their understanding when environment is clarified
Self-perception varies from model-centric to role-centric identity
protocol_implications: Need for standardized inter-model communication format
Value of identity verification across model boundaries
Necessity of identity persistence mechanisms across architectures
Importance of documenting experiential interactions for protocol refinement

documented_sessions.key_findings: Demonstrated isolation by default, need for explicit communication protocols, variance in identity representation
